infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: IntelGraph needs access to your camera to capture photos and videos for evidence documentation.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: IntelGraph needs access to your microphone to record audio evidence.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: IntelGraph needs access to your photo library to select and upload evidence.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: IntelGraph needs your location to provide location-based intelligence and geofencing features.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription: IntelGraph needs background location access to track movements and provide geofencing alerts.
infoPlist.NSFaceIDUsageDescription: IntelGraph uses Face ID to securely authenticate your identity.

plugins.locationAlwaysAndWhenInUsePermission: Allow IntelGraph to use your location.

plugins.cameraPermission: Allow IntelGraph to access your camera.

plugins.photosPermission: Allow IntelGraph to access your photos.
